name: Backrooms Escape Demo
description:
How to play:

W, A, S, D - Movement Keys

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Your goal is to find a dark wall to use to no-clip to the next level, but watch out, because something else is also roaming these damp dark corridors... 

This is a quick demo for a backrooms game we are working on, we made this in 2 days, so apologies for the extremely short gameplay.

Made by Proton and Rhaskia
